# a person who is in favour of joint control by workers and management
types.html:
autogestionnaire m or f by sense (plural autogestionnaires)

  1. a person who is in favour of joint control by workers and management
trans: a person who is in favour of joint control by workers and management

title: autogestionnaire
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /o.tɔ.ʒɛs.tjɔ.nɛʁ/, /ɔ.tɔ.ʒɛs.tjɔ.nɛʁ/
